participant_1.background:
I am a loner, but I do enjoy my hobbies.
I'm proud of my daughter and mom!
I sometimes have a hard time relating to people who don't share my interests.
my friend once bought me a car.
I enjoy my bike rides with some tunes in my ears.

participant_2.background:
I like my job, but I don't have a lot of family support.
I would love to enjoy a sweet treat as a reward after my long drive to work.
I want a place where I can practice my dancing.
i work for the railroad.
i am a closet cannibal.

content.text: Hello! It is nice to meet you!
Hello there! It is nice to meet you too!
What is something you enjoy doing?
That is great! Do you have a favorite dance?
That is a fun dance! I love dancing too!
I would love to dance with you sometime!
That would be fun! I am a bit of a loner, but I do enjoy my hobbies.
That is okay! I am a loner as well. I don't have a lot of family support, so I like to spend time with my friends.
I am sorry to hear that! Do you have any kids?
I have a daughter, but I do not get to see her very often.
I am sorry to hear that! I am proud of my daughter and mom!
That is great! I am sure they are proud of you too!
Thank you! I am glad we are getting along!
Me too! I am looking forward to getting to know you better!
